abstract: Standing in Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, a tearful Ms. Knox made a brief statement to cheering supporters -- and was reminded to speak in English after so many years away.
snippet: Standing in Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, a tearful Ms. Knox made a brief statement to cheering supporters -- and was reminded to speak in English after so many years away.
lead_paragraph: Amanda Knox arrived in her hometown of Seattle on Tuesday, the day after being acquitted of murder charges stemming from the 2007 death of her roommate, Meredith Kercher, in Italy.

headline.main: Video of Amanda Knox in Seattle
